title: GDG DevFest  Western Kenya  2015 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest  Western Kenya  2015 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in  Western Kenya !

title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Ukrainian Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the fifth annual GDG DevFest 2016 which is the biggest Google related event in  Western Kenya  carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **9-10th of September** in **Lviv**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: DevFest Western Kenya announced! The 5th edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in  Western Kenya  will take on **September 9-10** in an ancient city of Lviv. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](http://bit.ly/df16-c4p).
